name: Orbital (itch) (Louis Denizet)
description:
The game is about reflex and dexterity in a calm paper looking world!

- Press R to restart a level to gain time!
- Use mouse to select planets to go towards to
- Press Esc if you want to leave the game anytime!

You will have to be quick to be able to get through the levels 

We took around 2 days to make the game, we spent first day doing prototypes not finding an interesting idea!

Graphisms : Melissandre Samson

Anyway we really hope you enjoy the game
